bibl.title: Enigmatic Hints at the Hidden Meaning of Two Central Homeric Passages. The Derveni-Author as Homeric Philologist in P.Derv. col. XXVI.

series.title: Sozomena. Studies in the Recovery of Ancient Texts.

bibl.title: Tracing Orpheus: Studies of Orphic Fragments In Honour of Alberto Bernabé.

bibl.seg: Bierl Anton, Enigmatic Hints at the Hidden Meaning of Two Central Homeric Passages. The Derveni-Author as Homeric Philologist in P.Derv. col. XXVI.

Miguel Herrero de Jáuregui, Ana I. Jiménez San Cristóbal, Eugenio R. Luján, Raquel Martín Hernández, Marco A. Santamaría, Sofía Torallas Tovar (Eds.), Tracing Orpheus: Studies of Orphic Fragments In Honour of Alberto Bernabé = Sozomena. Studies in the Recovery of Ancient Texts. 10 (Berlin - New York, 2011) pp. 393-398.
